description: AmeriDroid recently featured the iSG Display Max Gateway, a flexible platform designed to streamline smart home management and automation. With its 10-inch display and support for Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Low Energy, the gateway integrates multiple protocols to offer flexibility for diverse smart home setups. The device is powered by an eight-core processor, although specific details […]
title: iSG Display Max Gateway for Smart Home Automation with Matter and Zigbee
